text: The women's singles tennis event at the 2015 Summer Universiade was held from July 4 to 12 at the Jawol International Tennis Court in Gwangju, South Korea. Chang Kai-chen of Chinese Taipei won the gold medal, defeating Luksika Kumkhum of Thailand in the final, 6–1, 6–2. Beatrice Gumulya of Indonesia and Varatchaya Wongteanchai of Thailand won the bronze medals. ==Seeds== The top three seeds receive a bye into the second round. == Main draw == === Finals === === Top half === ==== Section 1 ==== ==== Section 2 ==== === Bottom half === ==== Section 3 ==== ==== Section 4 ==== == Consolation draw == === Consolation Finals === === Top half === === Bottom half === ==References== *Main Draw Women's Singles
title: Tennis at the 2015 Summer Universiade – Women's Singles
